caseStudies.name: Kaftanize
caseStudies.description: Founded in 2020, Kaftanize brings modern elegance to traditional kaftans, with designs that merge heritage patterns with contemporary fashion. Known for their premium fabrics and versatile silhouettes, Kaftanize has become a go-to destination for women seeking both style and substance.
challenge: Reward loyal customers who were already recommending the brand
Drive new customer acquisition without escalating CAC
Launch and test performance campaigns quickly without engineering help
solution: ₹500 Referral Rewards: Dual-sided reward structure—₹500 for the referrer and 15% discount for the friend
Automated Workflows: Referral links and nudges delivered via WhatsApp and email at regular intervals
On-site CTAs: Plug-and-play referral widgets added to the purchase journey and thank-you pages
Analytics Dashboard: Real-time visibility into top referrers, conversion rates, and ROI

results.roi: 17x ROI from referrals in just 60 days

testimonial.quote: Ripples gave us a plug-and-play referral system that just works. Our customers love sharing Kaftanize, and now they're getting rewarded for it. It's been a game-changer for our growth.
testimonial.author: Rahul Agarwal

keyTakeaways: Kaftanize used Ripples to build a referral engine that delivers predictable, performance-based growth
Seamless integration with Shopify and WhatsApp helped trigger referral nudges at the right moments

caseStudies.name: Smartveda
caseStudies.description: Founded with a mission to bring ancient Ayurvedic wisdom to modern lifestyles, Smartveda offers a range of health supplements and wellness products. Their flagship products, like Dybit Amrit and Kadwa Amrit, have garnered a loyal customer base seeking natural solutions for health management.
challenge: Scaling customer acquisition without escalating marketing costs
Encouraging repeat purchases and fostering brand loyalty
Implementing a referral system that was both effective and easy to use
Reaching customers on WhatsApp where they are most active
solution: 20% cashback to customers for each successful referral
Instant rewards credited to the customer's store wallet
Seamless integration with WhatsApp for effortless sharing
Transparent dashboard for tracking referrals and earnings with real-time WhatsApp updates

results.roi: 22x ROI from referrals in just 60 days
results.timeline: Program launched & scaled by Ripples Team

testimonial.quote: Implementing Ripples' referral program was a game-changer for us. It not only rewarded our loyal customers but also brought in new ones through trusted recommendations. The simplicity and effectiveness of the system exceeded our expectations.
testimonial.author: Smartveda Team

keyTakeaways: Smartveda leveraged Ripples to transform satisfied customers into brand advocates
The referral program's user-friendly design and instant rewards encouraged higher participation rates
